metadata.title: CVE-2016-2399 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the quicktime_read_pascal function in libquicktime1.2.4 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service orpossibly have other unspecified impact via a crafted hdlr MP4 atom.

criterions.comment: libquicktime: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
